Assistant Professor of Psychology at Augustana University. I work in music and social cognition, focusing on the neuroscience of rhythm perception and the rhythms of social interactions. Occasionally dabble in philosophy of cognitive science.

Teaching undergrad courses in Cognitive Psychology; Behavioral Neuroscience; Music, Brain & Society; Psychology of Language; Research Methods etc
